snippet: It is still too soon to say with any confidence that the labor market has found its footing.
abstract: Editorial warns that, despite November's strong employment report, it is still too soon to conclude that labor market has found its footing; notes that hourly wage increases are not enough to make up for years of stagnation, and that most added jobs do not offer enough pay or hours to make a living.
lead_paragraph: It is still too soon to say with any confidence that the labor market has found its footing.

headline.main: Better News on Jobs, but Not Good Enough
headline.print_headline: Better News on Jobs, but Not Good Enough
